Agreement_A.description: Required Truth-in-Lending (TIL) disclosure is not included anywhere in the agreement, violating general consumer-loan disclosure standards.
Appraisal date is not stated; policy requires evidence that the appraisal is dated within 90 days of closing.
No privacy notice is provided, contrary to the compliance requirement for consumer loans.
Document does not indicate that borrower and co-borrower incomes have been verified (e.g., pay-stubs, W-2s) as required under residential mortgage documentation standards.

Agreement_B.description: Monthly P&I shown as $14,557.23; a 25-year amortization at 5.75% on $1,750,000 should be ≈$11,020, indicating miscalculation.
Payment amount aligns with a 15-year amortization, yet Amortization Period is stated as 25 years, creating internal inconsistency.
Policy requires demonstration of DSCR ≥1.25; agreement sets covenant but provides no actual DSCR calculation or supporting cash-flow data.
Privacy notice absent; required for all borrowers under institutional compliance guidelines.
No reference to entity formation documents or certificate of good standing, which must be verified for LLC borrowers per commercial loan standards.

Agreement_C.description: Truth-in-Lending disclosure statement is not provided, violating consumer HELOC disclosure requirements.
Loan Terms set a $500 minimum draw, while Additional Provisions require at least $10,000 in the first 12 months, presenting conflicting draw requirements.
No privacy notice included, contrary to general compliance requirements for consumer credit products.
Outstanding first-mortgage lender name and loan number are not identified, leaving lien position verification incomplete.
